Description: Located in Tysons Corner, Avalon Park Crest is a brand new Virginia apartment community situated in desirable Fairfax County. Avalon Park Crest offers spacious Tysons Corner apartments with luxurious features. Community amenities include a state-of-the-art fitness center, sparkling swimming pool, underground parking, and the ease of maintenance-free living. Nearby attractions include a Harris Teeter grocery store, Starbucks, the Tysons Galleria Shopping Mall and the Tysons Corner Center Mall. Add in convenient access to transportation via the Silver Line Metro stations, Dulles Toll Road, I-495 and nearby Dulles Airport.

Description: At The Ashby at McLean, restaurants, grocery stores, parks, top rated schools, medical offices, and a post office are right at your fingertips. With these conveniences in walking distance, living at The Ashby at Mclean makes life simple. These beautiful and affordable apartments are just 3 miles from Tyson?s Corner, 10 minutes to Great Falls National Park and four stoplights to downtown Washington, D.C. The Ashby is also less than a mile from the brand new Silver line metro stop.

Description: Set in the most exclusive Tysons Corner location, The Lofts at Park Crest features world-class apartment living adjacent to the area's most extraordinary shopping, dining and entertainment options. Now available for lease, these loft apartments are located within a pedestrian-friendly urban community with tree-filled spaces and resort-style amenities. This extraordinary community is served by a Starbucks coffee shop to help you start your day and a Harris Teeter market to nourish your love for cooking. The neighborhood grocery's flagship store will offer traditional goods as well as a tremendous selection of gourmet prepared foods, fresh meats and cheeses, and specialty wines from around the globe. The architectural design of the lofts was inspired by authentic urban neighborhoods such as Soho and Battery Park and offers an amazing array of unique designer finishes, including EcoFinishes, hardwood flooring, Wood-Model cabinetry, KitchenAid appliances, Grohe fixtures and Lualdiporte doors.

Description: Spread over 16 acres, Post Tysons Corner is a beautifully wooded community of courtyard and garden apartments. Post Tysons Corner is located in the heart of the Tysons Corner submarket of northern Virginia and offers convenient access to the Dulles Toll Road, U.S. 66 and I-495, and the Metro mass transit system. Residents of Post Tysons Corner enjoy an impressive array of community amenities, including a resort-style pool, four tennis courts, a full-length basketball court, and a beautifully landscaped courtyard complete with ornate fountains and grilling area.

Description: All the space you need, at the place you want: McLean. Time to find your own space? Come to The Commons of McLean. Here you'll find a space that's uniquely yours, newly renovated and stylish, great for showing off at your next party. An uncrowned space that's spread out amongst 40 acres of tree-filled gardens. Yet a space that's in the heart of McLean life, blocks from Fortune 500 companies. Choose from 15 amazingly spacious floor plans with one to four bedrooms, some on two levels. Spread out in oversized rooms; fill up oversized closets. Make it your space.

Description:
THIS IS A CONDO SHARE! Large private master bedroom with adjoining bathroom available in second floor unit to share with young (30ish), responsible male professional in exclusive condo community with all the amenities. Renovated this summer with tons of upgrades! 
*Living room balcony overlooks picnic area and woods. 
*High ceilings, crown molding, cozy fireplace. New hardwood and porcelain tiles throughout. 
*Floor plan completely separates bedrooms each w/private bathroom on opposite sides of unit for maximum privacy. 
*Available fully furnished bedroom suite has remodeled bathroom, large walk in closet, ceiling fan and big bright window for lots of natural light. 
*Kitchen--stainless steel appliances, maple cabinets, granite countertops. 
*Full size washer/dryer in unit
*Gated community has 24-hour security. Amenities include: elevators, fitness center, theatre, sauna, business center, coffee bar and beautiful pool and sundeck. 
*Best part is location! Located at the Gates of McLean community which is not only steps away from the McLean Silver Line Metro Station, but also has direct access to I-495, I-66, Dulles Toll Road, and Rt. 123. Additionally, it is located across the street from Capital One, only five minutes from Tysons Corner and less than 10 minutes away from Price Waterhouse Cooper, Deloitte, Capital One, KPMG and more. 20 minutes away from DC, Dulles Airport, and Ballston. The neighborhood is gated and in a very safe area. 
*Condo fees, water and reserved exterior parking spot included in $1,390 rent. Internet, gas and electric split. Available November 17th. This will go FAST so please call or text 703-371-5560!

Description:
Kings Manor Classic Townhouse
Looking to rent out our Townhouse 4 Bedroom / 3.5 bath to either a family or set of roommates. Our lovely townhouse is in the popular Kings Manor neighborhood in the heart of McLean. It has a eat-in kitchen with floor to ceiling bay windows and new appliances; dinning room; living room with a fireplace; 3 upstairs bedrooms gleamed with natural light, closets and 2 baths upstairs; half bath on main floor; hardwood floors and freshly painted throughout; downstairs has a bedroom with full bath and living room with a wet bar and fireplace. Front entrance is landscaped with a curving stair and back brick patio is fenced in with direct access to the neighborhood park/playground/basketball court. Townhouse is a quick walk to downtown McLean and has easy access to DC, Tysons, Reston, Dulles, and Silver Line Metro. Located in the Churchill Road Elementary/Cooper MS/Langley HS Pyramid, all within walking distance. Pets allowed. The rent includes water/trash/recycling but not including electric/gas utilities. Minimum 9 month lease available now! Please contact me via email to get renters application and schedule a tour.

Pet Policy: Dogs Allowed

Description:
This Beautiful End-Unit Townhome has it all!
Wonderful architecture & design creates a warm, inviting, spacious & gracious home for all. 
Almost floor to ceiling windows allow for tons of natural light.
The open floorplan is outstanding for gatherings and entertaining yet still offers many nooks for more intimate spaces.
The end unit location provides opportunity for windows on 3 sides of the home. This one lives and feels like a home - not a townhome!
The main level offers gleaming wood floors throughout the living room, dining room, kitchen, breakfast room, and FP nook.
The next level boasts a beautiful master suite complete with office/den/sitting room, sumptuous bathroom, and his hers walk-in closets.
The top level sports 2 nice size bedrooms and bathroom.
The lower level is perfect for that game room, media room, play space, workout area - whatever your imagination can conceive.
Ideally located less than a mile to McLean metro, close to all major commuter routes, a stones throw from thriving and growing Tyson's Corner with its world class stores and restaurants, yet tucked deep into the Hunting Ridge community where privacy and quiet reigns.
Freshly painted and spruced up, this beautiful townhome is ready to be lived in and loved!
Pets considered on a case by case basis. 
Long term leases welcome!
Available TODAY!
Please call or email for any questions or to schedule a time to tour your next home!

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Microwave
* Range
* Refrigerator

1923 Wilson Lane McLean VA 22102
Spacious, bright condo in the heart of McLean less than one mile to Silver Line Metro, and all the excitement of Tysons! balcony overlooking trees abundant parking, Includes gas & water. Close to both Tysons Malls. Easy access to Rt 123, Rt 495 & Rt 66. 
.

.
Easy online app & rent payments with TMKenny Property Services. See our reviews on Yelp & Google! EOH

Description:
(571) 502-3070 - Spring Hill: Contemporary Mansion-Style Home, Langley HS Pyramid - Grand fully loaded luxury contemporary colonial near Tysons * Fabulous features include a dramatic 2-story foyer with grand staircase; a family room with gas fireplace, adjacent open kitchen with granite countertops, island and brushed stainless appliances; a sun room, and a separate breakfast, room open to the deck and woods behind * Oak flooring throughout the main level * Upstairs each bedroom has it's own full bath, the master bedroom attached to a sybaritic Roman-style spa bath with whirlpool tub and separate shower * Walkout basement rec room with wet bar and nanny suite * 2-car garage * No smoking, pets case by case.
Available October 9, 2017
Lease term: 1 to 2 years
Security Deposit: $5500
Pet deposit: $500 per animal
Application fee: $50
Qualifications: 2 years of full-time employment history, 2 years of rental history (or home ownership), good credit, household income at least $220,000 (for groups sharing, that would be the sum of the 2 lowest incomes).

Better Homes & Garden Real Estate

(917) 865-0461 - Beautiful corner apartment (Apex model) with stunning west-facing views, spectacular sunset viewing everyday! Spacious & bright with walls of glass in the living room. Gleaming cherry hardwood floors, elegant tiled baths. Washer and dryer in apartment. Gourmet kitchen, dark cherry cabinets, granite counters, Stainless steel appliances, gas cooking! Comes with one dedicated parking space; a second one can be rented. Walk to 24 hour Harris Teeter, Starbucks, Tysons Galleria & Tysons Corner Metro! FABULOUS 18th floor Sky Bar & Roof Top pool, 24 hour concierge, gym, library and all the other luxuries of a high-end high-rise building. Zoned in prestigious Spring Hill-Longfellow-McLean pyramid, including the best elementary school in Fairfax county. Spring Hill school and Rec Center 5 minute drive away. Centrally located, less than 5 minutes from all major highways (267, 66, 495). 18 minutes from Dulles and 20 minutes from Reagan airport. What else might one want... Description:
(703) 457-0071 - Must see! Spacious Updated Rambler on Park, Parquet Floors, Langley HS - One-level living in tranquil central McLean Neighborhood * Charming expanded brick ranch-style home on large quiet fenced corner lot in Langley School pyramid adjacent to library, community center and wooded park land * Wood parquet floors in living room, separate dining room and bedrooms * Wood-burning fireplace and bay window in living room * Den or 4th bedroom with separate outside entrance plus large family room bumpout with built-ins and sliding glass doors to wooden deck * FIOS ready, satellite dish installed * Close to McLean shopping and restaurants. No smoking, pets case by case. Available NOW!
Pet deposit: $500 per animal.
Lease term: 1 to 3 years
Qualifications: 2 years of full-time employment history, 2 years of rental history (or home ownership), good credit, annual income of at least $ 124,000 (for groups sharing, that would be the sum of the 2 lowest incomes). 
Visit www.peakeinc.com to see more details and all our other listings 
Listed by Tammy Elkins, Realtor.
For information and showings call 703-457-0071
or email ttamelkins@bhgpremier.com with your phone number.
Showings by appointment.
This property is professionally managed by 
Peake Management, Inc. 
450 N. Washington St. 
Suite M
Falls Church, VA 22046
Office: (703) 448-0212 
Licensed in the Commonwealth of Virginia
(RLNE3424608) Other Amenities - Other- langley hs pyramid, single level, fenced rear, family room, corian counters, parquet floors, fios ready, backs to park, bay window, walk to community center and library, Deck.

Description:
(703) 893-6440 - Colonial Jr. 2bdrm/1bath Upgraded - This Upgraded Colonial Junior 2bedroom/1bathroom is 950 sq ft and features a square kitchen with a small breakfast bar, unique rounded balconies with french doors, and the washer/dryer in the kitchen. This unit also offers the benefits of a private entrance.
About Dolley Madison Apartments
This community is located in the heart of a thriving technology corridor as well as one of the most successful communities in the state, but you would never know it when you are looking at the rolling hills and parks that surround this classic apartment community in McLean. Despite the peaceful surroundings, you are only moments away from all of the conveniences that make this area so desirable. The community has all of your fitness goals and favorite activities covered. There are 3 different types of sport courts, four separate play areas and an Olympic sized pool. Dolley Madison is everything you are looking for in an apartment and more.
$1000 off the first month's rent special ends 10/10/17

Description:
1503 Natalie Joy Lane, McLean VA 22101
AVAILABLE IMMEDIATELY
.
Luxury living at its best in the heart of McLean proper. Close to two metros, and both Tysons Corner Malls.
.
Offered for rent is this large Townhome located in McLean proper. 4 bedrooms/3.5 Baths, and situated in the highly desired Lewinsville Square, makes this a very attractive find. This home offers large rooms, and an updated interior, coupled with an excellent location. 
This home gives you Sun filled rooms. Beautifully updated w/light cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, granite countertops in this beautiful kitchen.
Curved staircase showcases grand entrance. Gorgeous hardwood floors. Renovated basement top to bottom. 2 fireplaces. Spacious Master suite w/ arched entry door. Lovely fenced brick patio for relaxation. 2 assigned parking spaces, and guest parking.
Experience that highly desired Tysons Corner lifestyle, and the warm town feel of McLean. Less than 1 mile to Tysons metro, and both Tysons Corner Malls. 
.
Only minutes into DC, Convenient to Rt 66, Rt 7, 495, and GW Parkway. 
.

Description:
860 Sconset Lane McLean VA 22102
Size does matter! Beautiful contemporary large 5 Bedroom 3 Bath home situated on a cul-de-sac wooded area of McLean. Located less than 1/2 mile from entrance to beltway!!
. 
Quiet & peaceful, the deck across the entire back is in the trees! It offers remodeled baths, covered parking, beautiful hardwood floors, super large rooms, plenty of storage. It is fully available, ready to be called home, with loads of space in a contemporary floor plan.
.
Situated on private wooded lot that can be enjoyed from wrap decks, and screened in porch room. It offers a large recreation area in basement, in-law suite, or Au-Pair quarters and so much more.
.
Location, Condition, and Price! 1 Block to I-495, Two minutes to I-66, and George Washington Parkway. Five minutes to Silver Line Metro. Three minutes to Scenic Potomac River. 15 Minutes into Washington DC, and Georgetown. 20 Minutes into Olde Town Alexandria. Very close to Tysons Corner Center and Tysons Galleria Malls.
.
Langley High School pyramid. Pets on case by case.
.
Easy secure online application and rent payments with TMKenny Property Services. See our reviews on Yelp, Google, Angie's List and Thumbtack!!
.
EOH
